pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 2 $(li)Treasure = False $(li)Tradeable = True $(li)Rarity = Uncommon $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Increases your damage dealt, up to 100% bonus damage, scaling with your current health compared to max health

pages.title: Transcended
pages.text: Required Level = 200 $(br2)Keeps the holders healt at 50% and below $(br2)Values can be different from pack to pack
